name: World o' Boblo (old edition)
description:
⚠️NOTICE⚠️
World o' Boblo is receiving a full recode. This version will still able to play, but it will not be the most recent version.
World o' Boblo will be receiving a recode title of World o' Boblo: Recoded! This means this version of the game will be discontinued and will not receive any future updates. World o' Boblo: Recoded should be in beta mid-January hopefully.

Welcome to World o' Boblo!

(Yes, I know MG Points don't do anything yet)

Controls:
Press B to get out of stuff
Press M for map
Press I for inventory
Press P for Public Chat (press mail icon)
Press E in Avatar Shop to Equip
Press Z in Avatar Shop to Buy
The rest of the controls are in-game.
Have fun!
